name: Projector
description:
Submission for the Puzzle Jam II hosted by 8-bits-to-infinity!

This is a work-in-progress game making use of transparencies (the SLIDES used for overhead projectors and things) to build platforming puzzles. Ideally you would be able to add more transparencies on top of the main level slide which have different platforms on them*. I also decided to make the whole game one room because it seemed like a fun idea to have everything in one place but at different perspectives :o

Controls:

Menu: Mouse for buttons, Spacebar to start the levels, Esc to exit the levels.

Playing: Arrow keys/WASD to move, Spacebar to jump.

Credits:

*Due to my busy schedule, I wasn't able to implement desired mechanics, puzzling levels, nor music/sounds :(*
